record.dc:title: 113BN25 Ledbetter, Benton County, Tennessee. Burials 9BN51 and 9BN52. 9BN51 is a child with skull of 9BN52 showing over right shoulder. Note perforated pebble at left elbow (F.S. 9BN51-1). Square 19CA. Direction East.
record.wpa:narrative: [Burial 9BN51] Indeterminate child, fully flexed, flesh, burial on back, legs to right, arms back, oriented head to north. This burial was intrusive to 9BN52 and probably is the cause of the disturbance found in 9BN52. A drilled pebble lay below the left elbow. [Burial 9BN52] Adult female in good condition. Fully flexed, flesh, burial on right side, limbs flexed forward, oriented head to NW. This burial lay beneath 9BN51 and 9BN60. There were no artifacts.
